document.full_text: the guardian council has ruled that president mahmoud ahmadinejad overstepped his authority by assuming control of the oil ministry when he fired the oil minister a week ago.
document.title: middle east: iran: panel rules president overreached, report says
lines_and_colors: the guardian council has ruled that president mahmoud ahmadinejad overstepped his authority by assuming control of the oil ministry when he fired the oil minister a week ago.
